pullRequest.title: Entity rendering
pullRequest.bodyText:
ModelCuboidData - defines texture uv, offset, dimension, and texture scale for a cuboid
ModelPartBuilder a builder for a list of the above
ModelPartData - a node in a tree of model part data (cuboid data + rotation point data)
ModelData - a wrapper for ModelPartData and represents the root of the tree
ModelTransform - pivot point and rotation
TextureDimensions - internal class to store texture size (only used in TexturedModelData)
TexturedModelData - ModelData with a texture size
Dilation - dilates (additively) the size of a cuboid without increasing its texture area. Used for armor overlays, etc.
EntityModelLoader - seems to be the stub for a reloadable entity model system
EntityModels - static class that holds every entity model

commit.message: Map new stuff in entity renderers.

- EntityModelParts -> EntityModels
- ModelPartGroup -> ModelPartData
- ModelPartData -> ModelPartDataNode
- TexturedModelPartGroup -> TexturedModelPartData
